description: Create domain-specific context experts that are onboarded by Lloyd and maintain deep context about their assigned area of the codebase (UI, DB, Script, Docs, etc.)
goal: Provide Lloyd with meta-tools to create project-specific context-experts for ANY project. The tool provides infrastructure, Lloyd handles project-specific configuration.
requirements: Create 6 MCP tools: create_context_expert, list_context_experts, get_context_expert, suggest_context_experts, update_context_expert, activate_context_expert
Support domain types: UI, DB, Script, Docs, API, Core, Test, Infra
Analyze code structure (AST parsing for Python, regex for JS/TS)
Auto-discover expert candidates based on codebase analysis
Full access to project docs for onboarded experts
constraints: Follow existing docs-mcp patterns (decorators, validation, error handling)
Expert creation should complete in less than 5 seconds
Use existing personas-mcp patterns for inspiration
